In Staging mode the RCS controls are WS - pitch, AD - yaw, QE - roll. Also, KI translate up/down, JL translate left/right, HN translate forward/backward. Those are the default controls, if you want to change them they're under Settings - Input - Staging.

Settings - Input - Docking refers to docking mode, translation and rotation are on WASD and you swap between them with Spacebar.

I'd suggest trying to get accustomed to using both WASDQE and IJKLHN at the same time, in staging mode. But if you're still wanting to change the controls, Translation is the sideways/up down movement/forward back movement you're after.
